title: 78 The Ultimate Guide to Book Marketing (and Selling Thousands of Books Yourself) with Tucker Max
description:
"The most important thing for marketing anything is having something that people want." - Tucker Max
Learn from the best. Tucker Max describes what it takes to publish and market a best selling book. To learn more and get the details on publishing and marketing go to www.lewishowes.com/78
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
